title: Tether Gold Grows with More Than 7.66 Tons of Gold Backing XAU₮ as of Q2 2025, Confirming Continued Strength in Tokenized Gold
content: As of 30 June 2025, Tether Gold (XAU₮) remains the leading gold-backed digital token in the market, combining the enduring trust of physical gold with the efficiency of blockchain technology. With 246,524.330 XAU₮ tokens in circulation, each backed 1:1 by fine troy ounces of physical gold, Tether Gold continues to offer […]
